https://www.linkedin.com/company/startup.text:
After seven successful years of fostering entrepreneurship through PRIME, the Meghalaya Government is preparing to launch a renewed Startup Policy aimed at enabling scalable, innovation-driven growth. During a recent roundtable, officials and stakeholders highlighted the need for deeper ecosystem engagement, sharper financial incentives, and solutions for societal and environmental challenges. 

The upcoming policy aims to enhance market access, value chain integration, and collaboration with educational institutions. With a special focus on agri-tech, tourism, digital services, and traditional crafts, Meghalaya’s vision is clear: empower startups, elevate livelihoods, and build a future-ready economy anchored in sustainability and innovation.

Read more: http://bit.ly/4lajYEG 

Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

Shri Sanjiv | Shri Sumeet Jarangal

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #StartupNews #Collaboration #MeghalayaStartups

India has officially surpassed 1.85 lakh DPIIT recognised startups, reinforcing its position as the third-largest startup ecosystem in the world. Unlike earlier years, today’s growth is inclusive, with at least 1 women-led startups and 40% from Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities. 

Schemes like SISFS and FFS have paved the way for easy capital access, enabling over 118 unicorns and 17.6 lakh jobs. This isn’t just a surge in startups, it’s a shift in how India builds, scales, and leads in the global economy. And the journey has only just begun.

Read more: https://bit.ly/3HjndMd  

Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

Shri Sanjiv | Shri Sumeet Jarangal

#StartupIndia #DPIIT #StartupNews #Collaboration

The Jammu and Kashmir Entrepreneurship Development Institute (JKEDI) is set to roll out the first-of-its-kind Startup Idea Challenge to spark innovation and entrepreneurial spirit across the Union Territory. 

In alignment with the J&K Startup Policy 2024-27, the initiative will feature over 46 boot camps, intensive mentoring, and pitch training sessions. Finalists will compete at the Grand Finale in September 2025 for prizes worth ₹4 lakh, special awards, and incubation opportunities. Backed by key corporate partners, the programme will also connect top ideas to a 5-month national accelerator and exclusive benefits, creating a robust foundation for a vibrant startup ecosystem in J&K.

Read more: https://bit.ly/45njOUV

Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

Shri Sanjiv | Shri Sumeet Jarangal
 
#StartupIndia #DPIIT #StartupNews #Collaboration

IKP Knowledge Park, in partnership with the Wadhwani Foundation, is excited to launch the Wadhwani Liftoff Program — a 12-week self-paced accelerator designed to empower early-stage startups.

This unique program offers a hands-on journey through:

 ☑️ DIY gap discovery
 ☑️ Guidance from seasoned mentors
 ☑️ A peer-powered support network
 ☑️ Proven business tools for sustainable growth

Take charge of your startup's next leap.

👉 Apply now: https://lnkd.in/g__gXfaY 

📧 Questions? Reach out to us at teambig@ikpknowledgepark.com

Let's liftoff, together.

#StartupAccelerator #EarlyStageStartups #FoundersFirst #ScalingStartups #MentorshipMatters #InnovationDriven #BuildToScale #EntrepreneurJourney  

Wadhwani Entrepreneurship Sanghamitra Dutta Bhasin Rajeev Warrier Dr Shirshendu Mukherjee Deepanwita Chattopadhyay Bindu Nishal Viswanadham Duppatla Padmaja Konisetti Dr. Priyankana Mukherjee Apoorva Bhatnagar Sridhar Ramanathan IKP PRIME IKP EDEN Aaqib Jameel Vithal K Lakkineni, Ph.D. Dedeepya Chermala Vishaka Sawan Ranajit Sen Anuradha Barua Sudha Kalyani Bommareddy, Ph.D. Rohika B Rajeswari Sepana Shreyas Kudva

𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩

IKP Knowledge Park is proud to share that Dr. Vithal K Lakkineni, Ph.D. from the Technology Transfer Office at IKP PRIME was invited to speak at the AICTE Faculty Development Program on Innovation and Entrepreneurship held at Vignan's University (Deemed to be), Guntur, on 25th July 2025. 

Huge congratulations to Sandeep Satheesan CEO - Technology Business Incubator- Vignan, Vigan team Abdul R, Vijaya Ramu Dirisala, Dean, Pavan Kumar Kakumanu and Dr. Krishna Harshitha, Dr Kiranmayi Chanduri.
 
The knowledge-sharing session brought together a dynamic group of professors from MBA and BBA institutions. The workshop saw enthusiastic participation and insightful discussions around the innovation ecosystem, the evolving role of educational institutions in nurturing young entrepreneurs, and how faculty members can become effective startup mentors.

The workshop emphasised how faculty in Tier-2 cities can mentor startups from ideation to market. A key focus was on grassroots innovations in AgriTech, nutraceuticals, and food technologies, aligning institutional efforts with community needs. Participants were encouraged to build local innovation ecosystems and foster collaborations with government agencies. 

This workshop reinforced IKP PRIME's commitment to building inclusive innovation ecosystems and strengthened the connection between education, entrepreneurship, and impactful innovation.

Deepanwita Chattopadhyay Bindu Nishal Viswanadham Duppatla Dr. Priyankana Mukherjee Apoorva Bhatnagar Sridhar Ramanathan IKP EDEN Aaqib Jameel Dedeepya Chermala Vishaka Sawan Ranajit Sen Anuradha Barua Sudha Kalyani Bommareddy, Ph.D. Rohika B Rajeswari Sepana Shreyas Kudva

India is entering a new era of biomedical research, and the i3 Summit – विमर्श, hosted by Blockchain for Impact (BFI), marked a powerful step forward.

Bringing together leaders from science, industry, and government, the summit spotlighted how collaboration can accelerate translational research and drive healthcare innovation for all.

IKP was proud to be part of this important conversation shaping the future of biomedical innovation in India.

Deepanwita Chattopadhyay, was invited as a panellist to contribute to the panel "Indian Healthcare Innovation & Its Translation – Crossing Chasms & Bridging Gaps", sharing key insights on speeding the journey from research to real-world impact. She was joined by Dr. Sridhar Ramanathan, Dr. Viswanadham Duppatla, and Aaqib Jameel.

With initiatives like the BFI-BIOME Network gaining momentum, we look forward to contributing to a resilient, inclusive, and innovation-driven healthcare ecosystem for India and beyond. 

Nitin Gadkari | Vijay Chandru | Sandeep Nailwal | Satya Prakash Dash | Dr Gaurav Singh | Pooja Agrawal | Faraz Farooqui | Nagakarthik MP | Mustafa Inamdar | Sana Saifi | Jitendra Kumar | Dr Shirshendu Mukherjee | Shilpy Kochhar | Ramnath Ballala | Girish Agarwal | Ashish Lele | Souvik Maiti | Malathi Lakshmikumaran | Anurag Agrawal | Anand Anandkumar | Geetha Manjunath | Laina Emmanuel | Anand Sivaraman | Ravi Bhogu | Dr Nikhil Agarwal| Dr. Shantanu Pathak | Avinash C | Plotnew Bio Innovations Private Limited® | Ria Khurana | RNT Health Insights | Niramai Health Analytix | BrainSightAI | Remidio | Monitra Health | CareMother by Doto Health |

On #NationalScienceDay2025, CCAMP is excited to share some of its work that demonstrates the power of science to solve societal problems 

We are proud to be fostering several next gen deep-science based innovative solutions and research that are bridging critical gaps in healthcare, agriculture and environment

Some of these include
🧪Mitigating antimicrobial resistance, strengthening maternal and child health, treating degenerative illnesses and cancer, and developing diagnostics for infectious diseases,
🧪Replacing chemical pesticides with biologicals, boosting crop productivity and farmer incomes, and increasing food security
 🧪Capturing carbon and adopting climate resilient solutions

And, much more!

Presenting you a short film on the C-CAMP ecosystem where young ideas are born, deep science questions are pursued, nurtured and empowered to leapfrog to global leadership

Congratulations to CCAMP supported startup Biomoneta for winning the Silver Award at Medicall 2025, India's largest medical equipment and hospital needs expo. 

https://lnkd.in/guafRDhz

They participated with their dual infection-preventative technologies for use in the hospital environment to protect the immuno-compromised against hospital acquired infections or HAIs, a silent cause of many mortalities. 

Zebox, a powerful air sterilising device and qAMI - an AI/ML based platform for detection and measurement of airborne pathogenic load encompassing multiple microbes. 

Biomoneta is a cohort of CCAMP Department of Health and Social Care
 #GAMRIF #AMRInEnvironment, CCAMP SBI Foundation

https://www.linkedin.com/company/iitmand.text:
IIT Mandi Catalyst organized a curated workshop focused on 'Funding Schemes for Startups.' The workshop, skillfully led by Mr. Gaurav P., Associate General Manager at IIT Mandi Catalyst, aimed to empower founders by introducing the funding opportunities provided by IIT Mandi Catalyst.

The session emphasized seed investments, grants, and eligibility criteria tailored to different business phases. Discussions focused on aligning funding needs with growth stages, crafting persuasive proposals, and understanding investor expectations. Gaurav Parulkar's expertise provided startups with actionable insights, highlighting strategic approaches to leverage financial resources effectively for sustainable growth.

Dipankar Deb | Satvasheel Powar | Anil Singh | Harish Kanaujia | Salik Sarwar | Manish Singh | Ravinder Kumar | vishal sharma | Minni Kaur | Kushal Deep Jagota | Lipsa Rani Panda | Rewati Lal | Sanket Umap

#IITMandiCatalyst #IITMandi #Incubator #Startups #Innovation #StartupInHills #StartupFunding #IITMandiCatalyst #Entrepreneurship #StartupWorkshop #FundingOpportunities #StartupEcosystem #SustainableGrowth

📢  IIT Mandi Catalyst is pleased to invite applications for the Investment Readiness Program.

Join our Investment Readiness Program, a dynamic initiative designed for startups poised for commercialization and ready to secure investments for expansion. This program serves as a vital bridge between startups and the market, offering invaluable support and guidance to accelerate growth.

Program Highlights:
🔹 Craft a compelling pitch tailored for investors.
🔹 Benefit from personalized mentorship by industry experts.
🔹 Validate the financial viability and growth strategy of your venture.
🔹 Showcase your startup to potential investors on Demo Day.
🔹 Refine your pitch with feedback from seasoned professionals.

Demo Day:
Cap off your 90-day sprint with Demo Day, where cohort startups gain exclusive access to a curated audience of venture capitalists, angel investors, and grant providers. This is your chance to shine as you pitch your venture to influential stakeholders, paving the way for potential investments and strategic partnerships.

Don't miss this opportunity to propel your startup to new heights. Join our Investment Readiness Program and unlock the resources and connections you need to thrive in the competitive market landscape.

📅 Last date to apply: August 7th, 2025

👉 To apply for the program, click on the following link: https://lnkd.in/gDYCbEeE

🔗 Know more: https://bit.ly/4cl5mP8

Dipankar Deb | Satvasheel Powar | Anil Singh | Gaurav P. | Harish Kanaujia | Salik Sarwar | Manish Singh | Ravinder Kumar | vishal sharma | Minni Kaur | Kushal Deep Jagota | Lipsa Rani Panda | Rewati Lal | Sanket Umap

#Innovation #Entrepreneurship #StartupJourney  #iitmandicatalyst #iitmandi #CallForApplication #incubator #startups #startupinhills #InvestmentReadinessProgram

📢 Bharat Pitchathon 4.0 - Opportunity to pitch to Top Investors of the country, is coming to your state 🚀

Thrilled to announce that the highly anticipated third edition of India's Premier Series of Pitch Event, Bharat Pitchathon 4.0, is coming to 20+ States.

We, at the IIT Mandi Catalyst are delighted to partner as the Incubation Partner for Bharat Pitchathon 4.0.

Bharat Pitchathon 3.0 was a journey like no other with over 200 startup pitches, 600 investor-startup connections, 6-month growth  program and the invaluable support of 220+ partners including incubator & investment partners. 

Registration link - https://lnkd.in/gFhNupCv

What's in store for you at Bharat Pitchathon 4.0?
🔹 Pitch to Top Investors: Present your ideas to top investors for potential partnerships and funding.
🔹 Expert Connection: Gain insights and guidance from industry experts.
🔹 Resource Riches: Gain access to a treasure trove of mentorship, networking, and growth opportunities.
🔹 High-Impact Visibility: Elevate your startup's reach and visibility.
🔹 Thrilling growth program: Selected startups receive comprehensive support including mentorship, GTM support with opportunities to pitch to prominent investors on a national scale.

But that's not all! 

🔹 Top 50 startups will be a part of an accelerator cohort for deep dive learning and growth opportunities.

Registration link - https://lnkd.in/gFhNupCv

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to shine and make your mark in the startup world.

Headstart Network Foundation

🙏 Thank You, Saravanan Sundramurthy, for an Insightful Mentorship Session! 🚀

A big shoutout to Saravanan S for delivering an impactful session on Customer Segmentation for Scale at the DERBI Foundation 👏

Your deep experience in building startup ecosystems, helping raise 💰 $100M+ in funding, and supporting 🌱 100+ early-stage ventures truly inspired our founders. The frameworks you shared to identify, prioritize, and tailor offerings for the right customer segments were 💡 practical, actionable, and eye-opening.

We're grateful for your time, energy, and dedication to shaping the next generation of entrepreneurs! 🙌

Looking forward to continued collaboration and more high-impact engagements ahead 🔁💼

#MentorshipMatters #StartupGrowth #CustomerSegmentation #ScaleSmart #DERBIFoundation #FoundersFirst #InnovationEcosystem 💡🌍

Dr.Premachandra Sagar | Rohan Prem Sagar | Sathyanarayana B V | Bhavani G | Dr. Adithya Hande | Daamini Sharma | Karnataka Digital Economy Mission (KDEM) | MeitY Startup Hub | Startup India | IT BT Department, Karnataka | Dayananda Sagar University | Dayananda Sagar Institutions | Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, BANGALORE

🌍 Thank You, Tony Loaiza! ✨

We were honored to host Tony Loaiza, Silicon Valley-based CEO and seasoned entrepreneur, for an inspiring and eye-opening workshop on Startup Culture & Best Practices, with a special focus on the U.S. innovation and networking ecosystem.

Tony shared his wealth of experience around:
 🔹 Emerging tech trends in the global market
 🔹 Strategic networking and positioning in the USA
 🔹 Revenue growth frameworks, including the innovative Revenue as a Service (RaaS) model
 🔹 Practical lessons from building and exiting multiple companies

The session gave our founders a rare insider’s view into the mindset, agility, and strategy that define globally successful startups, and how Indian entrepreneurs can adapt these best practices to scale internationally.

Thank you, Tony, for generously sharing your journey and empowering our startup community to think global and act bold! 🌐🚀

#GlobalStartups #DERBIFoundation #StartupCulture #SiliconValleyInsights #RevenueGrowth #RaaS #FounderMindset #MeitYSAMRIDH #Entrepreneurship #MentorshipMatters #InnovationEcosystem #StartupIndia #ThankYou

✍🏻MoU Signing | UAE–India Start-Up Series
We are delighted to announce the signing of an MoU between the UAE–India CEPA Council and the Foundation for Innovation and Technology Transfer, IIT Delhi, a key driver of deep-tech innovation and entrepreneurship in India.
The MoU was signed by Dr Nikhil Agarwal, Managing Director of FITT, and Mr. Ahmed Aljneibi, Director of the UAE–India CEPA Council.
As part of the UAE–India Start-up Series Roadshow, this partnership strengthens our shared vision to support Indian start-ups with global ambitions through mentorship, funding and cross-border opportunities.

https://www.linkedin.com/company/social-.text:
What does it really take to solve a complex, systemic problem end to end? 

In this article, Manoj shares why Social Alpha was designed as a full-stack platform. Not to do everything, but to take responsibility where the system falls short. 

When your goal is to address poverty, climate, or disease, the traditional business playbook, focused on efficiency, specialisation, and competitive advantage, simply doesn’t hold. The market fails, repeatedly. And solving for that failure means stitching together what the market leaves behind: patient capital, translational research, community trust, policy alignment, and risk-sharing mechanisms. 

The full-stack approach isn’t about scale for its own sake. It’s about staying with the problem long enough to build the bridge, and then knowing when to step away. 

A powerful read on what it means to build for impact, systemically. 

Sustain Plus | Ganesh Neelam | Smita Rakesh | Dr Kavita Singh | Neeraj Jain | Harish Hande
 
#InvestedInImpact #PeoplePlanetProgress #FullStackDevelopment #SocialAlpha

Impact and Sustainability are among the most exploited words in the development world. But the essence is simple:

Go back to the roots. 

Prioritise soil health, and productivity will naturally follow. Design farm equipment with farmers, for farmers—just like the village blacksmith who used to built with deep understanding and care. Build market linkages that serve their interest, not digital intermediaries. And most importantly, treat farmers as bankable entrepreneurs, not beneficiaries of charity. Real impact is not about disruption. It’s about trust, dignity, and lasting systems.

The smiles in this picture reflect the joy of reduced drudgery for women farmers. For them, this is impact: the simple dignity of easier work, saved time, and a little less burden on their shoulders.

Form: https://lnkd.in/gbJWxdCR
To know more, visit: https://lnkd.in/grttaiye

Desh Deshpande | Raju Reddy | Phanindra Sama Bharat Singh | Rachit Parekh | Ramanathan (Ram) Narayanan |  Manish Jaiswal 
Sahiti Meduri | Yash Mittal | Rashmi Joshi | Soumya Chaugala | Chetan Madivalar |  Neelappa | Varadh Kulkarni 

#Bridge2Bharat #DeshpandeStartups  #StartupEcosystem #Growth #Entrepreneurship

2 Founders. 2 Experts. One Topic = 2+2 Model!

At Deshpande Startups, we’re rethinking how meaningful founder conversations should happen. Most traditional formats—such as panels or one-on-ones—tend to fall short. They're either too surface-level or disconnected from the realities of building in Bharat.

That’s why we introduced the 2+2 model:
 • 2 early-stage founders
 • 2 seasoned experts
One open, unscripted conversation—where ideas collide, perspectives challenge, and learning flows both ways.

We put this model into action with our first session on “Enabling Founders Beyond Metros – The ONDC Opportunity,” Moderated by Rashmi Joshi

As ONDC opens new pathways for inclusive digital commerce, we explored what it truly takes to enable founders building from beyond Tier 1 cities.

Experts: Nandita Sharma & Sachin Korla
Founders: Basanth Verma  & Manjunath Gogi

What it unlocks:
This initiative builds trust by fostering safe, direct conversations without posturing. It brings together experts from diverse fields like policy, design, and commerce to tackle challenges beyond a single product. This curation of different perspectives challenges assumptions, revealing that issues often stem from cultural or trust barriers rather than tech problems.

Big thanks to all four speakers and special appreciation to Nandita Sharma for her ONDC-wide insights that brought structure and momentum.

More 2+2 sessions coming soon!

Rashmi Joshi | Manish Jaiswal

https://www.linkedin.com/company/venture.text:
We’re delighted to share that Neuranics Lab has successfully completed the implementation and certification of the ISO 13485 Quality Management System! This marks a major milestone in their journey to develop a patented, rapid multispectral imaging and AI-based analytics device for blood analysis, parasite detection, and more. They are now entering an exciting phase, where they complete clinical studies, secure regulatory permissions and hit the market.

The RIFC Regulatory Information and Facilitation Center at Venture Center, played a key role in helping the team establish, implement, and achieve ISO 13485 certification. Reflecting on the experience, Praveen Kumar Bhagat, CEO of Neuranics Lab, says:

𝘗𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘯𝘦𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘙𝘐𝘍𝘊 𝘸𝘢𝘴 𝘪𝘯𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘢𝘭 𝘪𝘯 𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘱𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘶𝘴 𝘯𝘢𝘷𝘪𝘨𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘹𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘐𝘚𝘖 13485 𝘤𝘦𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯. 𝘞𝘦 𝘰𝘯𝘣𝘰𝘢𝘳𝘥𝘦𝘥 𝘙𝘐𝘍𝘊 𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘺 𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘭𝘺 𝘰𝘯 𝘪𝘯 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘫𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘯𝘦𝘺 𝘸𝘩𝘪𝘤𝘩 𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘱𝘦𝘥 𝘶𝘴 𝘪𝘮𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘦𝘭𝘺 𝘪𝘯 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘮𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘤𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘦𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘨𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘵𝘦𝘢𝘮 𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘘𝘔𝘚 𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘱𝘦𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦. 𝘛𝘩𝘦𝘪𝘳 𝘥𝘦𝘦𝘱 𝘳𝘦𝘨𝘶𝘭𝘢𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘺 𝘬𝘯𝘰𝘸𝘭𝘦𝘥𝘨𝘦, 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘵 𝘨𝘶𝘪𝘥𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘵𝘢𝘪𝘭𝘰𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘴𝘶𝘱𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵 𝘦𝘯𝘢𝘣𝘭𝘦𝘥 𝘶𝘴 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘮𝘭𝘪𝘯𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘤𝘦𝘴𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘢𝘤𝘩𝘪𝘦𝘷𝘦 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘪𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘦𝘧𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘭𝘺. 𝘚𝘱𝘦𝘤𝘪𝘢𝘭 𝘛𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘬𝘴 𝘵𝘰 𝘈𝘬𝘢𝘴𝘩 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘊𝘩𝘦𝘵𝘯𝘢 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘮𝘢𝘬𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘶𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘺 𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘢𝘷𝘢𝘪𝘭𝘢𝘣𝘭𝘦 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘯 𝘴𝘮𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘲𝘶𝘦𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘣𝘦𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘶𝘥𝘪𝘵 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘮𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘪𝘱𝘭𝘦 𝘐𝘯𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘈𝘶𝘥𝘪𝘵𝘴 𝘣𝘦𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘧𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘈𝘶𝘥𝘪𝘵 𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘦𝘹𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘯𝘤𝘺. 𝘞𝘦 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘭𝘺 𝘳𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘪𝘳 𝘴𝘦𝘳𝘷𝘪𝘤𝘦𝘴 𝘵𝘰 𝘢𝘯𝘺 𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘶𝘱 𝘭𝘰𝘰𝘬𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘰 𝘣𝘶𝘪𝘭𝘥 𝘢 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘰𝘯𝘨 𝘲𝘶𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘺 𝘧𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘥𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯.

𝗧𝗼 𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸 𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗽-𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗴𝘂𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁, 𝗽𝗹𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝘃𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁: https://lnkd.in/gcApthCs

Ready-to-Use Labs, Offices, and Desks and much more at India's largest incubator for science and technology based startups! Come.... 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝘂𝗯𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘂𝘀!

Venture Center is an award winning, leading incubator for deeptech, knowledge intensive startups, and our 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗜𝗻𝗰𝘂𝗯𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 for startups offers a range of benefits—without taking any equity!

1. World-Class Infrastructure

Access to state-of-the-art labs, fully equipped offices, and flexible desks. Our facilities are designed to meet the diverse needs of startups, providing everything you need to innovate and grow.

2. Expert Mentorship and Guidance

24/7 access to in-house expertise, in addition to customized one-on-one mentoring from industry veterans. 

3. Funding Opportunities

Access to seed funds, CSR funds, and government grants for different stages of your journey.

4. Prime Location

We are based in Pune, a city known for its thriving tech and innovation scene, and we are in close proximity to prestigious educational institutions and research centers. 

5. Comprehensive Ecosystem

Our extensive support network includes legal assistance, business development resources, regulatory and IP support, and access to workshops and events that provide valuable insights and networking opportunities. 

6. Vibrant peer group community on our campus

Surround yourself with like-minded innovators and entrepreneurs who can inspire and support your startup journey. 

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝘂𝘀 𝘁𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆! We're looking for startups with an innovative idea or technology in the early stages with a scalable business model!

𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝘁: https://lnkd.in/gNjukCqu
𝗖𝗮𝗹𝗹: +91-9172232211 
𝗘𝗺𝗮𝗶𝗹: managerincubator@venturecenter.co.in

#pune #startup #startupfounder #entrepreneur #zeroequity #incubator

Premnath Venugopalan Manisha Premnath Soma Chattopadhyay Misaal B. Gayathry S Amruta Gore Dr. Mugdha Potnis-Lele Smita Kale Neha Jacob

Join us for Flavours & Futures, a hands-on culinary workshop by VentureStudio and Ahmedabad University’s Food Services and Nutrition Team. Explore gastronomy through teamwork, taste, and creativity. Led by Executive Chef Rahul Bhale!

50+ innovators spent their Saturday joining us for an AI deep-dive. The venue? A buzzing classroom at the School of Arts and Sciences, Ahmedabad University. The mission? Master everything from LLMs to building working AI agents.

The journey:
Morning: Demystifying how large language models actually work
Midday: Lunch from Chef Rahul Bhale
Afternoon: Building AI agents using n8n (freshly minted batch of coders!)

What made it special: 
✓ Hands-on learning, not just theory 
✓ Zero technical background needed 
✓ Everyone left with new AI skills

Huge thanks to Jash Rathod for facilitation and every single participant who showed the dedication to invest a full Saturday in upskilling.

The best part? This is just the beginning.

We're committed to making cutting-edge tech accessible to our community through regular workshops like these.

Want to join our next session? Follow VentureStudio to be the first to know about upcoming workshops.

#GenerativeAI #AIWorkshop #VentureStudio #Innovation #AIEducation #Upskilling

"Complex problems require multiple knowledge systems."

Welcome home, Ahmedabad University Class of 2029!

Yesterday, our Vice Chancellor, Professor Pankaj Chandra, reminded parents and students why interdisciplinary learning is the foundation of our future. 

When engineering meets humanities. When business embraces biotechnology. When art inspires science. That's where innovation lives.

Students, get ready to think beyond textbooks and dream beyond disciplines.

The future is yours to shape!

#InterdisciplinaryLearning #Innovation #AhmedabadUniversity #Entrepreneurship #FutureReady

🚀 Cultiv8 (CIET - TBI) joins as the Incubation Partner for Startup Singam Season 2! 🦁

At Startup Singam, we believe founders deserve the right environment to turn their ideas into thriving ventures — and Cultiv8 (CIET - TBI) brings that vision to life with best-in-class incubation and support.

Through this collaboration, we aim to:
🔹 Identify & nurture promising early-stage founders
🔹 Accelerate their growth journeys with world-class incubation
🔹 Back their ideas with belief, community, and capital

Together, let’s build a culture where bold ideas rise — and fearless founders roar.

Building a Safer Workplace at iCreate! 

At iCreate, safety is a priority we never compromise on. Our Admin team, led by Cdr Parimal Verma – Head Administration and Ms sharwari Dalvi – Supervisor - Facilities, recently organized a Fire Fighting and Safety Training session for all employees. We took a professional approach to safety by partnering with the experts at VISWAMBI SECURITY AGENCY PRIVATE LIMITED, an experienced security agency. Their expert trainers delivered a comprehensive session focusing on practical fire safety measures, emergency response protocols, and the correct use of firefighting equipment—ensuring every team member is well-prepared for unforeseen situations.

#iCreateWithYou #WorkplaceSafety #FireSafety #EmployeeWellbeing #SafetyFirst #TeamiCreate

Avinash Punekar | Dr.Praveen D. | Dr. Raashid Saiyed | Dr. Sanjeev K Yadav | Hiiren Y. | Anish Chavda | Riya Singha | Anushka Raghuvanshi | Jaydeep Shah | Siddharth Pareek | Venushree Patel |

💡 Fueling Startup Growth with HPCL Udgam!

At the ProtoQuik Launchpad Demo Day, we were honoured to host Mr. SELLA PRABU RAJADURAI, General Manager – Business Development, HPCL, and Mr. Sayan Chakraborty, Manager – Business Development, HPCL.

They conducted an insightful session on the HPCL Udgam Initiative, HPCL’s flagship program that supports early-stage startups with funding up to ₹2.5 Cr, mentorship, and access to HPCL’s industry expertise and networks in energy, sustainability, and allied tech domains. Applications for HP Udgam Cohort 2025 are now open for DPIIT-recognised startups across these sectors.

🔗 Apply here: https://shorturl.at/5T4v9

Their session opened new doors for our cohort, reinforcing the power of industry–startup partnerships in accelerating innovation for energy transition and related sectors.

#ProtoQuikLaunchpad #HPCLUdgam #iCreateWithYou #IndustryConnect #CleanEnergyInnovation #StartupSupport
